channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A fixed point results of Kannan-type for multi-valued mapping on fuzzy metric spaces
item.description: arXiv:2405.04179v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove a Kannan-type fixed point theorem for multi-valued mappings on G-complete fuzzy metric spaces. The proof uses the Hausdorff fuzzy metric space which was introduced by Rodriguez-Lopez and Romaguera [19].
item.dc:creator: Shunya Hashimoto, Aqib Saghir

item.title: Some remarks on the projective properties of Menger and Hurewicz
item.description: arXiv:2302.12933v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: It is known that both the Menger and Hurewicz property of a Tychonoff space $X$ can be described by the way $X$ is placed in its \v{C}ech-Stone compactification $\beta X$. We provide analogous characterizations for the projective versions of the properties of Menger and Hurewicz.
item.dc:creator: Miko{\l}aj Krupski, Kacper Kucharski
